news.title: JANE'S ADDICTION Vocalist PERRY FARRELL Sues His Former Bandmates Hours After They Sued Him
news.summary:
He accuses his former bandmates of making "malicious and defamatory public statements" to destroy his reputation. 
 The post  JANE'S ADDICTION Vocalist PERRY FARRELL Sues His Former Bandmates Hours After They Sued Him  appeared first on  Metal Injection .
